summary: Provides functionality to read telescope model parameters from sim_telarray configuration files, convert them into the SimTools data representation, perform unit and type conversions, validate the resulting data against a schema, and expose the processed parameter dictionary for downstream use or export.
business_intent: Enables seamless integration of sim_telarray configuration data into SimTools workflows, supporting simulation setup, analysis, and documentation of telescope characteristics within the broader gammaâ€‘ray astronomy simulation ecosystem.
